英文法規名稱: The Fee-charging Standards for Using Government Information of Overseas Community Affairs Council, R.O.C. (TAIWAN)
中文法規名稱: 僑務委員會提供政府資訊收費標準

附件.檔案名稱: The Standard Table of Fees for Duplicating or Copying Government Information.pdf

沿革內容: 1.The enacted Standards with all 8 Articles were promulgated by Order of OCAC Chiao-Si-Dang-Zi No. 09530280481 on August 24. 2006, and will put into force by the date of the execution of The Freedom of Government Information Law.

法規內容.條文內容: These Standards are enacted according to Paragraph 2 of Article 22 of the Freedom of Government Information Law(hereinafter referred to as the “Law”).
The fee for viewing, copying, or photographing government information is NT$20 for two hours , time spent less than two hours is counted as two hours.

The fee for duplicating or copying government information shall be charged in accordance with The Standard Table of Fees for Duplicating or Copying Government Information (see attachment).
In the preceding paragraph not specified in these Standards, fees shall be charged according to the cost of duplication or copying.
If the applicant requests the duplicated or copied government information to be sent by mail, the actual mailing expenses shall be charged.

The applicant that requests for the government information for academic research or public welfare purposes must attach relevant documents at the time of application. Upon approval, the applicant must pay for the mailing costs; whereas other fees shall be charged at half price.
Duplication of government information for business or education promotions stipulated in Subparagraph 1 of Article 12 of the Charges and Fees Act shall be free of charge.
The fees set out in these Standards shall be charged in compliance with budgetary procedures.
These Standards shall be in force from the date of the enforcement of the law.
